lines.text:
[interrupts]
No, Thanks! Only amateurs work for the shipping charges alone. Besides, I don't work for dumb bastards who use kids as accomplices.
Will you let me watch TV or listen to the radio?
No way! Semmer will get mad at me!
Exactly what is she to you?

[pause]
Um, how old are you, anyway?
It isn't polite to ask a lady her age.

[Rally has just awakened Bean with a hot frying pan]
Rally, your wake-up technique leaves a lot to be desired. Were you gonna fry my eyeball for breakfast?
Well, you wouldn't wake up when I used the stun gun!

[Twenty armed guards surround the car]
My, my. All those nice men gathering around us. I wonder what they're doing when they're not so busy.
Drink, smoke, watch TV, and gamble. It's a tradition.

[referring to Bean]
That man, he will save my papa, won't he? He's going after the bad guys, so he's a good guy, right?
Really? Does he seem that way to you?
